author: mbk
msg: This change completes the UUID implementation: a new RA vtable method,
"get_uuid" is added, and implemented for ra_dav, ra_local, and ra_svn.
(svn_ra_plugin_t): Add "get_uuid", a method for obtaining the UUID
(svn_ra_local__open): Store the repository UUID in the session baton.
(svn_ra_local__get_uuid): New function, implements get_uuid for ra_local.
(svn_ra_local__get_file): Fix bug that caused added files not to get
the UUID property when updated over ra_local.
(svn_ra_local__get_dir): Fix bug that caused added dirs not to get
the UUID property when updated over ra_local.
(upd_change_xxx_prop): Populate baton's uuid from UUID property.
(delta_proplists): Include the UUID with the other entry props.
(ra_svn_open): Receive the UUID at the end of the connection handshaking.
(ra_svn_get_uuid): Implement the get_uuid RA-vtable method for ra_svn.
(svn_ra_dav__do_get_uuid): Implement to get_uuid RA-vtable method for ra_dav.
This is accomplished via a call to get_dir(), passing "" for the path,
(get_props): force the UUID into the properties hash.

author: striker
msg: Remove this branch.  Changes were merged back to trunk already.

author: dws
msg: apxs requiring httpd during the subversion build process.

author: gstein
msg: Hide Expat types from the public interface so that we don't have to
worry about including the correct Expat header (which in turn requires
(struct svn_xml_parser_t): make this opaque by moving the definition
(svn_xml_make_parser): change declaration to use the new
- add include of the appropriate Expat header
(struct svn_xml_parser_t): moved from svn_xml.h. added fields for
the SVN-specific callbacks and the user baton.
functions to thunk between the Expat callbacks and the
(svn_xml_make_parser): change parameter types to the SVN-specific
callback types. install Expat handlers IFF the corresponding
SVN-specific callbacks are provided. store the SVN callbacks and
the user's baton into our private structure. store our private
structure into the Expat parser, rather than the user's baton.

author: brane
msg: Add "--quiet" option to "svnadmin dump", and a regression test for same.

(test_list): Added dump_quiet. Also updated comment at the top of the file.
